other_tests.findings: Normal oropharyngeal swallowing with moderate intraesophageal retrograde flow.
Grew very few colonies of yeast and normal respiratory flora.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During hospitalization, a sputum culture grew enterococcus, coagulase-negative staphylococcus, and two candida species.

other_tests.findings: Parietal pleura speckled with white nodules; biopsy revealed malignant epithelioid neoplasm diagnostic of diffuse malignant mesothelioma.
Malignant epithelioid neoplasm with various histologic features indicative of diffuse malignant mesothelioma.
